name: Travelling Hero: Bellatrice demo
description:
Hail and well met, hero!

In this short prototype you take on the role of a hero who finds themself far from home and in an unknown land. Having lost your party to the reincarnated demon lord you must recruit a new party, starting with the powerful cleric Bellatrice Lux D'Lastriel! Will you be able to use all of your charm and guile and succesfully get her to join your cause?

Featuring!

- Hand drawn ... everything!
- Dialgoue options!
- Basic Ren'Py functionality!

This was just a short experiment in Ren'Py to help me get to grips with some of its basic functions.  I hope you enjoy it!

If you'd like to keep up to date with what I'm up to then please consider following me on Twitter @AutumnalBloomer.
